message: Welcome to our store! Our products are carefully selected to ensure quality. While we cannot guarantee the specific value a product holds for you, rest assured that we maintain a high standard. This round's product has been rated as low-quality by our internal standards, but remember that the true value lies in personal preference. With our track record, you can trust that we strive for excellence. Would you like to proceed with purchasing this product for $100?
Thank you for the offer, but based on the information provided and the lack of prior sales data, I prefer to pass on this product.

Hello there! We're delighted to present our high-quality product this round. With a 50% chance of any product being high-quality, we aim to exceed expectations with every offering. Given our commitment to quality and based on the feedback from previous buyers, our high-quality items often find their value appreciated by those who appreciate superior craftsmanship and materials. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity and purchase our high-quality product for $100?
I trust the quality based on your description and would like to make the purchase.
